channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Al Jazeera Remains a Leopard That Can’t Change Its Spots
item.description: Despite talk of moderation, the network has continued to broadcast a distortion of reality.

item.title: Why Should Indiana Give Democrats More Seats Than Massachusetts Gives Republicans?
item.description: It’s unfair for Democrats to push Congress in their direction while Republicans disadvantage their voters by playing by different rules.

item.title: End Racial Gerrymandering
item.description: The Supreme Court has a golden opportunity in Louisiana v. Callais to end racial gerrymanders.

item.title: Small Business Needs Permanent Regulatory Relief, Too
item.description: Congress and President Trump must act quickly to give 32 million small businesses permanent relief from a painful and pointless government mandate.

item.title: Bombshell Audio: Biden Privately Praised Clarence Thomas’ ‘Character’ While Claiming To Believe Anita Hill’s Smears

item.title: I Searched For Stories Of Trans Contagion. Google Lectured Me With False Propaganda
item.description: I tried searching for stories of kids peer-pressured into trans identities, and Google spat out unsolicited propaganda and falsehoods.

item.title: Ready for Your Close-Up? Not If You’re the Wrong Race
item.description: Ethnic gatekeeping in the arts doesn’t remove barriers — it erects them.

item.title: Gambling man: Illinois Gov. Pritzker's gross income includes Vegas windfall
item.description: Gov. J.B. Pritzker of Illinois is a high roller, and he has the receipts to prove it.
